reviews.text: After reading the reviews here, as well as the AAA rating of 3 stars, we decided to give this hotel a try (the price was right). What a deal it was! Our family of 4 had a wonderful time during our 3 nights stay. Free parking is definitely a bonus, as well as early checkin at noon. Upon making a reservation, we requested a refrigerator (for a $10 fee) and we were able to use a microwave in the main hallway. We stayed on the first floor of the newer section (we requested this based on a review we read) and loved the layout of the oversized room! Most hotels we've stayed in didn't have the floor space that this room had. It also had a separate luggage storage area. The room was kept very clean (good maid service). The staff was exceptionally helpful and never seemed to mind being asked for advice or guidance on how to get the best view of the falls, find a store, etc! The location was excellent - close to the falls, but in the quiet Fallsview part of town. The only disappointment is that our kids were looking forward to playing on the playground equipment, which was recently taken down. However, we stayed very busy sightseeing, and did not feel it was a big deal. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone (it's not just for the frugal folks).
reviews.title: Great Deal and Great Location!

reviews.text: We booked three rooms at the Fallsview for one night as we wished to see Niagara Falls & visit with relatives. I choose the Fallsview because of phone contact that I made with Amy & Raquel when I called twice to ask questions regarding the Hotel. I found them so friendly & accommodating that I felt sure they must represent a good hotel. We were not disappointed. All three families found their rooms to be large, very clean, quiet & within easy walking distance of the Falls. We also made use of the breakfast room & the nearby pizzeria restaurant. We consider the staff to be excellent & will recommend this hotel to all our friends who want a well-priced, friendly hotel. Our special thanks to Amy & Raquel for their professionalism & interest in making our stay a pleasant experience.
reviews.title: So pleased with the Rodeway Inn Fallsview

reviews.text: I booked this hotel for a trip with friends for Memorial day weekend after reading reviews on TripAdvisor. What a wonderful stay we had! The room was very clean, the staff - courteous. Breakfast is great too! I would highly recommend for anyone to stay here. It is only a brief walk to the falls. I'd definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: I picked the Rodeway Fallsview because of the rave reviews on Trip Advisor. I'm happy to add one more. The older wing of the hotel was currently undergoing remodeling, so we had rooms in the newer wing. This is a smaller hotel with only three floors, and located within walking distance of the Falls. Excellent location, yet the rooms were quiet.
reviews.title: Nice Place, Amazing Value

likes.liked: — Cleanliness, room appointments, comfortable bed, close to the Falls

reviews.text: We had two King rooms (including sofa beds) that were good sized and nicely appointed. No five-star hotel I've stayed in was any cleaner than this Rodeway! The beds were clean and very comfortable. The entire staff was friendly and helpful, and the people at the front desk were the nicest I've ever encountered. Ask them, and they'll send you to the restaurants where the locals go!

reviews.title: Perfect family hideaway

reviews.text: If I had to complain about one thing it's that going up three flights of stairs (no elevator) at the end of a walking day is one final chore but the price and the room made the climb worth it.
reviews.title: Did not like it at all.

reviews.text: We stayed in the Rodeway Fallsview for 2 nights. The front desk was super helpful. It appears that there is an older and a newer section in the motel. We were in the older section. Overall the room looked nice and was clean. There was no refrigerator or microwave in room. The sink had cracks in it and the bathroom needed updating. Very limited wireless internet. The location is great and very close to the Incline Railway that goes down to the Horseshoe Falls. A short walk down Murray Ave leads directly across from the American Falls. There were many restaurant options near the motel. We drove right up to the motel and checked in with our car near the room. A good alternative to the high rise hotels and all the commotion and parking issues that go with them.
reviews.title: Clean and resonable but somethings to beware of

likes.disliked: — Limited internet access and No Elevators

description: Rodeway Inn Fallsview is a 3-Diamond AAA-rated property located in the Fallsview Tourist District adjacent to the new Scotiabank Convention Center. In the heart of Niagara's major attractions, it is within a short stroll of the Falls, Fallsview Casino, Skylon, Journey Behind the Falls, People Mover, and much more. Guests enjoy spacious, comfortable rooms with full amenities at very reasonable rates. Two on-site restaurants, free wi-fi, ample on-site parking, and a heated outdoor pool are sure to compliment the stay.
